#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   int t;
   for(scanf("%d",&t);t;t--)
   {
       ll p,q;
       scanf("%lld%lld",&p,&q);
       if(p%2!=0 and q%2!=0)
       printf("B\n");
       else
       printf("A\n");
        
   }
   
   return 0;
}
